naslov: Veliko imanje s tri renovirane kuće, bazenom i spektakularnim pogledom (prodaja)
opis: Manor predstavlja ekskluzivno imanje smješteno na lokaciji iznad Opatije, u idiličnom i tihom okruženju, koje svom vlasniku nudi potpunu privatnost te izvanredan investicijski potencijal. Smješteno na obroncima Učke, ovo imanje pruža čaroban panoramski pogled na Kvarnerski zaljev, netaknutu prirodu i apsolutni mir, a ipak je samo nekoliko minuta vožnje udaljeno od plaža, Opatije i svih važnih sadržaja. Urednu i ograđenu okućnicu triju kuća koje se nalaze na imanju, čini zemljište površine 4110 m2, na kojem je moguća izgradnja dodatnih objekata za turističku djelatnost. Na imanju se nalaze tri zasebne, kompletno renovirane kuće (2012.) Sve kuće imaju podno grijanje, a postavljeni su i solarni kolektori. Dodatni sadržaji su bazen (23 m²), sunčalište i velika natkrivena terasa. --- Sadržaj kuća na imanju: 1. Glavna kuća (321 m²): Raspored prostorija po etažama: U suterenu: konoba - vinski podrum s toiletom i garaža; u prizemlju: otvoreni dnevni boravak te kuhinja s blagovaonicom, toilet, spavaća soba na katu: 3 spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom 2. kuća (139 m²): Raspored prostorija po etažama: Prizemlje: dnevni boravak 1. kat: 1 spavaća soba s kupaonicom Suteren: velika natkrivena terasa s izlazom na bazen i dodatne prostorije s mogućnošću prenamjene (wellness, igraonica...) 3. kuća (104 m²): Raspored prostorija po etažama: Prizemlje: open-space dnevni prostor s kuhinjom i kaminom, toilet, 1 soba 1 spavaća sobe s kupaonicom Ova ekskluzivna nekretnina idealna je za one koji traže autentičnost, udobnost i privatnost, a istovremeno žele iskoristiti odličan turistički potencijal Opatijske rivijere. Prava rijetkost na tržištu! ——— Manor Real Estate represents an exclusive estate located above Opatija, in a peaceful and idyllic setting that offers complete privacy to its owner, along with exceptional investment potential. Nestled on the slopes of Mount Učka, this property boasts a magical panoramic view of the Kvarner Bay, unspoiled nature, and absolute tranquility—yet it is only a few minutes’ drive from the beaches, Opatija, and all key amenities. The well-maintained and fully fenced grounds, covering a total area of 4,110 m², encompass three houses and offer the possibility of building additional structures for tourism purposes. The estate features three separate, fully renovated houses (renovated in 2012). All houses are equipped with underfloor heating, and solar collectors have also been installed. Additional amenities include a 23 m² swimming pool, a sunbathing area, and a large covered terrace. Layout of the houses on the estate: 1. Main House (321 m²): Room distribution by floor: Basement: wine cellar with a toilet and a garage Ground floor: open-plan living room, kitchen with dining area, toilet, and one bedroom First floor: three bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom 2. Second House (139 m²): Room distribution by floor: Ground floor: living room First floor: one bedroom with en-suite bathroom Basement: large covered terrace with direct access to the pool, and additional rooms with potential for conversion (wellness area, playroom, etc.) 3. Third House (104 m²): Room distribution by floor: Ground floor: open-space living area with kitchen and fireplace, toilet, and one room Upper floor: one bedroom with an en-suite bathroom This exclusive property is ideal for those seeking authenticity, comfort, and privacy, while also wishing to take advantage of the excellent tourism potential of the Opatija Riviera. A true rarity on the market! ID KOD AGENCIJE: 134-31 MANOR NEKRETNINE d.o.o. Mob: +385 99 365 7230 Tel: +385 51 504 909 E-mail: info@manor.hr www.manor.hr
